attributes.action: UKIP's Nigel Farage to be involved in ALL 2015 General Election televised debates
attributes.additional_details:
UKIP are now a full force in Mainstream British Politics. UKIP won the national election in the European Elections in May of this year. UKIP is polling higher than the Liberal Democrats in almost every poll taken. UKIP is often beating Labour and Conservatives in polls around the country.

This is a democratic country and the people want UKIP to share their voice so the public can decide fairly.

UKIP need to be in all televised debates.
